_header: One cock suffice fifteen hens / scarse fifteen men suffice one woman
_description: ‘Dictio hisopii’ — one couplet, with Latin version on f. 2: ‘Dictio hisopii: Gallus galinas terquinque sufficit vnus / Sed terquinque viri non sufficiunt vna mulieri’

BLAru220.Transcription: One cock sufyse xv hynnysScarse xv men suffise one woman
BLAru220.Note:
Written as prose. The second word, ‘cock’, is added
                    supralinearly by the scribe.
